item.description:
We have been meeting bi-monthly at Panera Bread in Brookline on Harvard Avenue (between Beacon Street and Zaftigs). We have a small, supportive core group that is committed to meeting, getting to know each other, and supporting each other. We invite more people to join us. You would receive a goal handout on which you can write down one small, measurable goal and can also track your progess. You will only get a handout if you rsvp with a "Yes" by 3pm on Wednesday.

I will be away on vacation from March 10-18, so I cannot lead a meeting on the 17th or on the 24th for personal reasons. I will work on getting a host for one of these dates.

UPCOMING MEETING: Guest speaker (professional organizer) on April 7th---to be confirmed

SOME REASONS TO JOIN THIS MEETUP:
Do you not invite guests to your home for parties because you are embarrased about how it looks?
Do you block off a room in your house when you have company so they can't see all the stuff in there?
Do you have multiple storage units and you don't know what is where?
Do you have piles of papers on your desk and you aren't sure where to put them?

CLUTTER BUDDIES:
Some people have found clutter buddies who support each other in reaching their goals. One person from Quincy is still trying to find one. Let me know if you need a buddy and would like to contact her.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the patio on the left side as you enter Panera. I have a manila folder that I will place on the table.

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Bi-Monthly Meeting--Creating A Home That You Are Proud Of (T Accessible)
